creditline: Gift of the W. Duncan and Nivin MacMillan Foundation
inscription:
Title and Inscription

URC, in pencil: [Pl. 26]; Lower center, below image, in black ink: [DACOTAH ENCAMPMENT]
provenance: James J. Hill (St. Paul, 1838-1916); his estate; James Jerome Hill Reference Library, St. Paul (by 1921-1994; sold October, to MacMillan); W. Duncan MacMillan, Wayzata (1994-d. 2006); the W. Duncan and Nivin MacMillan Foundation (2006-2014; given to MIA)
signed: LL, below image, in black ink: [Capt. S. Eastman U.S. Army Delt]
title: Dacotah Encampment
